title: Create petrol pump management and inventory system

requirements.text: Implement fuel sales recording system for petrol and diesel with automatic stock deduction upon each sale transaction

quotes: पेट्रोल, डीज़ल की बिक्री का रिकॉर्ड

acceptanceCriteria: Sales transactions record fuel type (petrol/diesel), quantity, and price
Stock levels automatically decrease when a sale is recorded
Sales history is persisted and queryable

requirements.text: Create real-time inventory monitoring showing current fuel levels in each tank with visual indicators

quotes: टैंक में कितना ईंधन बचा है उसका रियल-टाइम डेटा

acceptanceCriteria: Display current fuel quantity for each tank in real-time
Show tank capacity and percentage filled
Provide visual gauges or progress bars for fuel levels

requirements.text: Implement automated re-order alert system that triggers notifications when fuel stock falls below configured threshold levels

quotes: री-ऑर्डर अलर्ट जब स्टॉक कम हो जाए

acceptanceCriteria: Allow configuration of minimum stock thresholds per fuel type
Generate alerts when stock drops below threshold
Display active alerts prominently in the dashboard

requirements.text: Build billing system supporting multiple payment methods including cash, card, UPI, and wallet payments with payment tracking

quotes: कैश, कार्ड, UPI, वॉलेट पेमेंट सपोर्ट

acceptanceCriteria: Record payment method for each transaction (cash, card, UPI, wallet)
Calculate total amount including taxes
Track payment status and reconciliation

requirements.text: Create digital receipt generation system with transaction details, fuel type, quantity, price, and payment information
acceptanceCriteria: Generate receipts containing transaction date, fuel type, quantity, price, and payment method
Display receipts in a printable format
Allow downloading or viewing past receipts

requirements.text: Implement employee management system with shift timing records and attendance tracking functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Record employee shift start and end times
Track attendance with check-in/check-out functionality
Maintain employee roster with shift assignments

requirements.text: Create employee sales performance reporting showing individual sales metrics and targets
acceptanceCriteria: Track sales per employee per shift
Display sales volume and revenue by employee
Generate performance comparison reports

requirements.text: Build customer loyalty program with points accumulation system based on purchase volume and value
acceptanceCriteria: Award points to customers based on fuel purchases
Track customer point balances
Allow redemption of points for discounts or rewards

requirements.text: Implement membership card management system for customer loyalty program with unique customer IDs and reward tracking

quotes: मेंबरशिप कार्ड या ऐप आधारित रिवार्ड्स

acceptanceCriteria: Register customers with unique membership IDs
Link loyalty points to customer accounts
Display customer membership status and rewards

requirements.text: Create comprehensive reporting dashboard with daily, weekly, and monthly sales reports including fuel volumes and revenue

quotes: डेली, वीकली और मंथली सेल्स रिपोर्ट

acceptanceCriteria: Generate sales reports for selectable date ranges (daily, weekly, monthly)
Display total fuel sold by type and total revenue
Provide export functionality for reports

requirements.text: Implement profit and loss analysis reporting showing revenue, costs, and net profit margins
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate revenue from fuel sales
Track operational costs and expenses
Display profit margins and net profit/loss

requirements.text: Build tax and GST reporting module calculating and displaying tax liabilities based on sales data
acceptanceCriteria: Calculate GST on fuel sales transactions
Generate tax reports for specified periods
Display tax breakdowns by category

requirements.text: Create fuel price management system allowing manual updates of petrol and diesel prices that apply to future transactions

quotes: Fuel Price Update Integration (ऑटोमेटिक प्राइस अपडेट)

acceptanceCriteria: Admin interface to update fuel prices
Price changes take effect immediately for new transactions
Maintain price history for auditing

requirements.text: Implement emergency alert system for critical events such as fuel leakage or safety issues with prominent notifications

quotes: Emergency Alerts (लीकेज या सेफ्टी इश्यू की नोटिफिकेशन)

acceptanceCriteria: Allow manual triggering of emergency alerts
Display alerts prominently across the application
Log alert history with timestamps and descriptions

requirements.text: Build multi-branch management functionality allowing owners to manage multiple petrol pump locations from a single interface

quotes: Multi-Branch Management (अगर मालिक के पास कई पंप हों)

acceptanceCriteria: Register and manage multiple pump branches
View consolidated reports across all branches
Switch between branch views in the interface

requirements.text: Create pump location finder feature showing nearby petrol pumps on a map with address and distance information
acceptanceCriteria: Display list of pump branches with addresses
Show distance information for each branch
Provide visual map or location markers

requirements.text: Implement public fuel price display showing current petrol and diesel prices at each pump location

quotes: फ्यूल प्राइस चेक करने का विकल्प

acceptanceCriteria: Display current fuel prices publicly without authentication
Show prices for all fuel types
Update prices when admin changes them

requirements.text: Build pre-booking and reservation system for large vehicle fuel orders such as trucks and buses

quotes: प्री-बुकिंग या रिज़र्वेशन (जैसे बड़े ट्रक/बस के लिए)

acceptanceCriteria: Allow customers to create fuel reservations with vehicle details
Specify fuel type, quantity, and preferred time slot
Display upcoming reservations in staff dashboard

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme for the petrol station management application with a professional color scheme (avoiding blue and purple), clean typography, and industry-appropriate styling that works across dashboards, reports, and customer-facing interfaces
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied throughout the application
Professional typography suitable for business management software
Layout and UI patterns appropriate for fuel station operations

constraints: No external SMS, WhatsApp, or Email integration APIs supported (digital receipts must be displayed/downloadable only)
No real GPS/maps API integration supported (pump location display must use static data)
No real-time IoT sensor integration supported (IoT data entry must be manual or simulated)
No external fuel price API integration (prices must be manually updated by admin)
nonGoals: Automatic IoT sensor data ingestion from hardware
Automatic fuel price updates from external APIs

required: Modern fuel pump icon for the application logo (fuel-pump-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Dashboard hero background with abstract fuel station theme in warm earth tones (dashboard-hero.dim_1920x400.png)
Fuel tank gauge illustration for inventory monitoring (fuel-gauge.dim_400x400.png)
